valueCodeableConcept.text: Percentage of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)

title: Percentage of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) (NCT03640312)
description: Percentage of participants with any Serious Adverse Events (SAE) according to Good Clinical Practice definition: adverse events that result in death, are life threatening, require hospitalization or prolong existing hospitalization, result in persistent disability, result in congenital anomaly or birth defect, or unimportant medical event that requires intervention to prevent any of the above.
citeAs: Percentage of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) (NCT03640312) [Database Entry: FHIR EvidenceVariable Resource].
